column1: # title: Lines for ternary diagram domains
# author: Jérémy Ragusa
# description: dataset for various geological classification domains in ternary diagram using ggtern package
# references:
# Borkman JW (1955) Sandstone classification-relation to composition and texture. Journal of Sedimentary Research 25(3):201-206. doi : 10.1306/74D7044D-2B21-11D7-8648000102C1865D
# Crook KAW (1960) Classification of arenites. American Journal of Science 258(6):419-428. doi : 10.2475/ajs.258.6.419
# Dapples EC Krumbein WC Sloss LL (1953) Petrographic and Lithologic Attributes of Sandstones. The Journal of Geology 61(4):291-317. doi : 10.1086/626098
# Folk RL (1954) The Distinction between Grain Size and Mineral Composition in Sedimentary-Rock Nomenclature. The Journal of Geology 62(4):344-359. doi : 10.1086/626171
# Folk RL (1970) Detrital sedimentary rock classification and nomenclature for use in New Zealand. New Zealand Journal of Geology and Geophysics 13(4):937-968. doi : 10.1080/00288306.1970.10418211
# Gilbert CM (1955) in Williams H Turner FJ Gilbert CM. Petrography. Freeman and Co. 406p.
# Hubert JF (1960) Petrology of the Fountain and Lyons formations along the Colorado Front Range. Quaterly of the Colorado School Mine 551-242
# Krumbein WC Sloss LL (1951) Stratigraphy and sedimentation. Freeman and Co. 497p.
# Krynine PD (1948) The Megascopic Study and Field Classification of Sedimentary Rocks. The Journal of Geology 56(2):130-165. doi : 10.1086/625492
# Lerbekmo JF (1963) Petrology of the Belly River Formation Southern Alberta Foothills. Sedimentology 2(1):54-86. doi : 10.1111/j.1365-3091.1963.tb01200.x
# McBride EF (1960) A classification of common sandstones. Journal of Sedimentary Research 33(3):664-669. doi : 10.1306/74D70EE8-2B21-11D7-8648000102C1865D
# Packham GH (1954) Sedimentary features as an important feature in the classification of sandstone. American Journal of Sciences 252(8):466-476. doi : 10.2475/ajs.252.8.466
# Pettijohn FJ (1949) Sedimentary rocks. Harper and Brothers 525p.
# Pettijohn FJ (1954) Classification of Sandstones. The Journal of Geology 62(4):360-365. doi : 10.1086/626172
# van Andel TH (1958) Origin and classification of Cretaceous Paleocene and Eocene sandstones of western Venezuela: American Association of Petroleum Geologists Bulletin 42(4):734-763
# Vatan A (1954) Pétrographie sédimentaire. Technip 279p.
# revoir pettijohn1954-1957 fig.7 dans Klein1963
